meta.name: GitHub
meta.description: A collection of queries for GitHub MCP Server.
meta.note: Each entry includes a user query and its corresponding tool function name. Useful for LLM tool selection evaluation.

queries.query: Search for top 5 Python repositories related to 'llama', sorted by stars.
Fetch the contents of the readme file from the main branch of the 'llama-stack-on-ocp' repository by 'redhat-et'.
List the most recent 3 commits title of the 'llama-stack-on-ocp' repository by 'redhat-et'.
List the current open issues in the 'llama-stack-on-ocp' repository by 'redhat-et'.
Search for issue mentioning 'streamlit app', only list first 3.
Search for the user 'RHETbot' on GitHub and describe the user.
Get the details of issue number 5 in the 'llama-stack-on-ocp' repository by 'redhat-et'.
Get the details of pull request number 18 in the 'llama-stack-on-ocp' repository by 'redhat-et'.
List the top 3 most recent pull requests in the 'llama-stack-on-ocp' repository by 'redhat-et'.
Get the files changed in pull request number 20 in the 'llama-stack-on-ocp' repository by 'redhat-et'.
Get pull request status of pr number 20 in the 'llama-stack-on-ocp' repository by 'redhat-et'.
Get pull request comments of pr number 18 in the 'llama-stack-on-ocp' repository by 'redhat-et'.
Get the reviews of pull request number 20 in the 'llama-stack-on-ocp' repository by 'redhat-et'.
